column1: USAPL NC Show of Strength Challenge
Name             Age  Div  WtCls     SQ1    SQ2    SQ3    BP1    BP2    BP3    DL1    DL2    DL3   TOTAL  Pl-Div-WtCl
Name             Age  Div  WtCls                          BP1    BP2    BP3                        Best   Pl-Div-WtCl

USAPL North Carolina has a new meet promoter, Brent Hindman. For his first meet everything went very well, with some quality lifting. This was due to some great volunteers, mostly Brent's friends and family. The sponsors showed up big and included Peak Fitness, Inzer Advanced Designs, Dicks Sporting Goods, and Exper-Teez. Without their generous sponsorship meets like this would be impossible. The lifting included multiple NC State Records. The day was capped off by Todd Shelton tying Travis Mash's long standing deadlift record on his second lift. Todd then broke it on his third attempt by more than 10 pounds, with a deadlift of 672@198lbs., to win the best lifter award. This all took place with Travis in attendance, who showing great sportsmanship, was one of the first to shake Todd's hand.
